bug_reproduction_test_plans/mongodb-oper.test_config_content:
workload: recreate
actions:
- actionType: pauseAPIServer
  apiServerName: kind-control-plane3
  pauseScope: perconaservermongodb/default/mongodb-cluster
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger1
      condition:
        conditionType: onObjectUpdate
        resourceKey: perconaservermongodb/default/mongodb-cluster
        prevStateDiff: '{"metadata": {}}'
        curStateDiff: '{"metadata": {"deletionGracePeriodSeconds": "SIEVE-NON-NIL",
          "deletionTimestamp": "SIEVE-NON-NIL"}}'
        occurrence: 1
      observationPoint:
        when: afterAPIServerRecv
        by: kind-control-plane3
    expression: trigger1
- actionType: reconnectController
  controllerLabel: mongodb-operator
  reconnectAPIServer: kind-control-plane3
  async: true
  waitBefore: 10
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger2
      condition:
        conditionType: onObjectCreate
        resourceKey: persistentvolumeclaim/default/mongod-data-mongodb-cluster-rs0-2
        occurrence: 1
      observationPoint:
        when: afterAPIServerRecv
        by: kind-control-plane
    expression: trigger2
- actionType: resumeAPIServer
  apiServerName: kind-control-plane3
  pauseScope: perconaservermongodb/default/mongodb-cluster
  trigger:
    definitions:
    - triggerName: trigger3
      condition:
        conditionType: onTimeout
        timeoutValue: 20
    expression: trigger3
